text: Anshuman Jain (7 January 1963 â€“ 12 August 2022) was an Indian-born British business executive. From 2017 to 2022, he was the president of Cantor Fitzgerald. He was the Global co-CEO and co-Chairman of Deutsche Bank from June 2012 until July 2015. He was born in Jaipur, India. Jain died on 12 August 2022 from a rare form of stomach cancer in the United Kingdom, aged 59. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom Category:Indian businesspeople Category:British businesspeople Category:British bankers
title: Anshu Jain
